name: Stick Survivors
description:
Stick Survivors is a simple game about surviving an endless onslaught of enemies. This game was inspired by games like Vampire Survivors, Risk of Rain, and an old-school classic Stick Arena. 

The game sessions are short (~10mins) and the game currently takes about an hour to fully complete. You select a character to play, defeat enemies, level up, get stronger and survive as long as you can to unlock more characters. The game also features a custom character option where you can combine your favorite abilities from the characters you've unlocked to create unique builds.

I plan to add several more game modes, enemy types(other than just some naked dudes), maps, challenges, and as many new characters as I can manage. I want each character to be modeled after characters from anime, movies, comics, etc. The more characters that I add the larger the possibilities become for custom character builds. I would also like to add high scores and mod support if the interest is there.

Let me know in the comments what characters, modes, or features I should add next.

Controls:

(WASD) - Controls character movement

(left-click) - Basic attack

(1 or right-click) - Dash ability

(2 & 3) - Combat abilities

(4) - Ultimate ability

(Esc) - Pauses the game

(Tab) - Level up
